column1: tw: self harm <e1>i didnt know where else to write this</e1> so <e2>i just chose here</e2>. lately <e3>ive been wanting to do weird things</e3>. <e4>ive been showering whilst wearing clothes</e4> and <e5>ive started to do that a lot</e5>. im not insecure about my body but i like the feel of showering in my clothes. <e6>ive also been cutting myself a lot</e6>. <e7>i like the feel of the blood running down my arm and the burn of the blade</e7>. <e8>ive been getting thoughts in my head to hurt people or purposely upset them</e8>. and when i get home from school i straight away just sleep. sometimes <e9>i sleep in school</e9> because <e10>im tired a lot of the time</e10>. i dont expect anyone to respond i just wanted to tell someone

getting addicted to a losing game.i spent my whole life waiting for someone and she finally came <e1>just to die she committed suicide</e1> and why did <e2>i not see it that she was depressed </e2>and <e3>i did nothing nothing at all</e3>.until it was to late
my brain goes like ow you're happy nope not on my watch and i feel like shit again.

"im constantly told by family members about everything thats wrong with me, even if they dont mean to imply it. i cant speak to any family about my mental health without them turning it into some lecture on how i need to be more social and stop being lazy. <e1>im failing school</e1>, <e2>im scared that i might not even pass my sophomore year</e2>, <e3>i feel like a failure</e3>. <e4>im constantly belittled by family</e4>, and it affects me greatly. <e5>i just want to give up</e5>. <e6>im always the odd one out of my cousins</e6>, theyre so different from me, <e7>they always hang out and im left at home</e7>. <e8>i feel invisible at family gatherings</e8>, im definitely not the life of the party and i hate being the center of attention. its getting harder and harder to hide my depression, ill be fine and then<e9> ill find myself staring off into no where with overwhelming thoughts clouding my head. like maybe no one would notice if i wasnt even here</e9>."

i wish i could just die. right now i am looking over a 40 story  balcony but <e1>i know i have to stay alive</e1>. <e2>i want to go home and see my family </e2>but i feel so ashamed hiding in my house.

i wish i could just fall asleep and never wake up. im so fucking tired of people telling me how i should just hang in there or some stupid bullshit. i wish <e1>i had no family or friends</e1> so <e2>i could just kill myself already</e2>. <e3>im so tired</e3>. <e4>i wish i could sleep all day</e4>. sometimes i dont even try to get out of bed and i get shouted at. sometimes all i can feel is just anger. i dont know what im angry at but i just get so angry. sometimes <e5>i wish i could murder somebody </e5>just to<e6> know what its like</e6>. im so tired of studying. im so tired of doing anything. <e7>im so tired</e7> <e8>i just want to sleep</e8>. <e9>the only time people message me is when they want to send stupid shit or need something from me</e9>. whenever i try to talk to them they just end up leaving. <e10>im so tired of trying</e10>.

sleeping brings me peace and puts me in a better world i can dream and be free. i know it sounds kinda dark and harsh and dont mean for it to be but when <e1>im sleeping i dont feel anxious about my crappy job or bills or anything im just at peace</e1>. really <e2>wish humans could hibernate for a few months</e2>.

i know you shouldn't act out of depression like you shouldn't act out of being drunk.but <e1>i can't help it</e1><e2>i am so utterly alone</e2>. i want someone to love me. i want someone to look excited when i come home. i want to cuddle. and i have so much free time it is slowly killing me.<e3>i know i can't care for it</e3>. <e4>my apartment doesn't allow pets</e4>. <e5>my parents would kill me</e5>. <e6>i would have to care for it's health and pay extra taxes</e6>.still i just want a puppy

"all of it is coming back. i'm four months off of my antidepressants and it's all coming back like my proces meant nothing. <e1>all the years fighting my depression are wasted</e1> and <e2>it just truly shows that it's not just a ""period"" of my life</e2>. it is my life. and <e3>i can't talk to anybody about it</e3>, because <e4>i'm embarrassed</e4> and <e5>too proud to admit that i'm not strong enough</e5>."

"whenever <e1>i feel heavy form of depression, or just feeling like i'm not doing something right</e1> <e2>i've punch myself really hard in either my forehead or on the top of my head</e2>. i've told my gf how it leads to this and how <e3>she is not good for my mental health</e3> when <e4>she is unsympathetic towards me regarding this issue</e4>. she keeps telling me she doesn't want this to happen and it seems genuine, but today i was trying to help her zip up her dress and <e5>she kept yelling at me for not doing it right</e5>. <e6>i felt small and stupid</e6>and right after i couldn't do it <e7>i sat down and punched myself hard in the forehead</e7>. it's not for attention (at least not consciously) and i've never done it in front of her before but all <e8>she said was ""seriously?"" and started getting dressed</e8> because <e9>she had to work on an assignment</e9>.am i wrong for thinking this? i know its wrong to <e10>hit myself</e10>, but <e11>i can't help but feel anger towards her for reacting like that</e11>."

"yeah, <e1>it fuckin sucks</e1>. being lonely feels like shit. <e2>the only people i interact with are my parents, my brother and my therapist</e2>. who wants such a life?and the worst part is that <e3>my parents and brother dont understand me and my problems</e3>. <e4>im lucky</e4> <e5>i have my therapist</e5>. but <e6>only having 1 person you trust</e6> <e7>doesnt feel very good</e7>.its not like i miss my old friends, cause hey, fuck them, their loss, but <e8>i just want new friends</e8>. and thats when <e9>social anxiety comes in</e9>. fuckin anxiety kills me.does anyone wanna talk? <e10>ill be glad</e10> to even <e11>hear other peoples problems</e11>."

"i'm no-one, i don't even like to reread my posts. <e1>i've always been sorta spiritual</e1>, so <e2>i didn't think depression could truly hit me</e2>, but it did, yeah. <e3>i'm even afraid to turn music on</e3>, cause <e4>i know i won't be able to enjoy it the way i used</e4>, but maybe i will. <e5>i still fear it<e5>. <e6>all i can is stare at that wall and do nothing</e6>, this is bullshit really"

"i cant do this anymore <e1>i broke today</e1>. <e2>i cried to the point where i couldnt breathe</e2>, which i havent done in a while. <e3>im so mentally and physically drained</e3> <e4>i literally can not do this anymore</e4>. i fucking hate myself and im stuck here with no way to kill myself. im so alone, nobody would even expect me to kill myself. i thought i was at my lowest a couple months ago but i keep getting lower somehow. i have 5 assignments due tomorrow and i have started none of them... <e5>my dog is scared of me</e5> because <e6>im crying</e6> please help."

"i really feel like this. i don't understand life and i don't think i'm capable of, at least, some real level of understanding. i feel too dumb for this, even though i've always considered myself smart. i look around me and see so many depressed people from our generation. i look in the mirror and i just don't understand who i am anymore.it's like, before i distract myself with smth i find interesting (hooray, it's still possible!), i'm just nothingness floatin' behind 2 eyeballs. no one really matters, u can make things feel important to you (thanks, human psyche!), all we have is this life, but there's nothing more, no matter how hard u try to search. <e1>u can only distract yourself before you die</e1>, that's it.sometimes, when i think about it,<e2>i actually truly feel like not being born or dying just nowwould be a more real/truthful option,than ""accepting"" everything and going on with your life</e2>.<e3>don't kill yourself</e3>, though, cause <e4>u might miss out on smth cool in the future lol</e4>"
<e1>i'm depressed</e1> <e2>my eye lids are dark and my family enjoys fucking me into this state</e2>. <e3>i don't want to wake up anymore</e3> what should i do?

"<e1>i lack the slightest bit of necessary motivation or initiative</e1> to <e2>put any real effort into college</e2>, but i care enough to <e3>loathe myself for it</e3>; to say im a failure is an understatement, but my family still have an irrational amount of faith in me. all that and i still have an unearned, desperate desire for validation.apologies for my incoherent rambling, i just wanted to express my self-hatred to something besides my mirror, i hope you have a pleasant day (:"

"ive spent the past year and a half comfortable with where i was, and too <e1>scared of getting better</e1> cause its been such an unknown feeling and <e2>i have a fear of the unknown anyway</e2>. ive turned to drugs before (mainly ketamine) and it was a temporary fix but never worked out. same with self harm.today i sat down and made a list of the things i want to do by 2022. preferably i want to complete the list by my 18th birthday (october), but im saying 2022 to give me some extra leeway.i dont know if this is the right place to post this but im finally ready to start my recovery and im finally feeling like i could actually get better."

i took a shower for the first time in 6 weeks.  i also cleaned my room today. this semester really took a toll on me and <e1>im proud of myself</e1> for <e2>being able to clean up and organize</e2> ??
"this shit is annoying and i hate that my tears will just roll down in the wrong moments instead of whenever i'm alone, <e1>it's tiring</e1> <e2>being anxious and depressed</e2>..."

"i started crying and called my boss over to let him know that im not feeling well obviously and then a shit show came to be where a customer was waiting at a register and my boss is calling everyone up front. one person to put money in a register, called 2 people up to be a cashier and <e1>i felt so embarrassed</e1> bc <e2>im just there crying</e2> and they're just looking at me. i cant help but feel them being upset at me and <e3>i just feel like a burden</e3>. i understand i have responsibilities to do and <e4>i hate myself for not being able to do my job</e4> and crying and <e5>making everyone do more work</e5> bc <e6>i'm too inadequate</e6>."

"so recently <e1>i feel very exhausted and tired</e1> from <e2>all the bullshits around me</e2>. i have a prom these days, parties and all the stuffs for graduation but <e3>i have no energy for anything</e3>. <e4>everybody around me are very happy</e4> and seem to have fun but not me. i know <e5>this is the best moment of every student's life</e5> and all but <e6>i can't enjoy it</e6> and i think some day <e7>i will regret it</e7>. i dont have motivation for anything and the exams are in one week. <e8>they are very important</e8> because <e9>my life is depending on them</e9>. please tell me what to do. what's wrong with me?"

i've been having suicidal thoughts again today. i know i'm not ready to commit a suicide but the thoughts are here again. and <e1>i've just had an argument with a friend</e1> and it makes <e2>me feel worthless</e2>.

"i don't really matter. i have a spouse and only one parent still alive although she is quite old and in very poor health. spouse and i have discussed divorce so really after that it is just my mom. i don't get people wanting to hang out, talk, etc. i have people that i call ""friends"" but really are just associates or friend of friend types. they are nice enough and do the whole like things posted of social media but never really engage kind of relationship. <e1>i am somehow mad, sad, and just overwhelmed</e1> all at the same time. i want to scream and cry all together.i don't <e2>want to die</e2> per se but <e3>i'm so lonely</e3>. just that sense that comes when <e4>you realize nothing would really change for anyone if i were not here</e4>. not sure people would even notice honestly. <e5>i wish i lived in the past</e5> when <e6>you could hop on a ship and reinvent yourself in a new country</e6>. now everything is digital and immigration is so tight that is seems like you are stuck wherever you were born."

well firstly <e1>there's a bit of guilt</e1> there for <e2>not picking it up when i pick stuff like that up with other people</e2>. so he told me mw about it this morning and i don't know what to say to him. i just said that i'm glad he's getting help and that i'll check in on him more often. we're not extremely close but i want to be there for him. i just don't know how

so fucking glad i had to be born by 2 degenerate idiots with brain damage so i too can enjoy slaving a shitty life away wooo!!! <e1>have kids yaa so much fun and excitement</e1> <e2>they'll grown to love it right team hahah right team</e2>

"<e1>i have literally no one in my life</e1> and will be spending my 20-something birthday alone this year crying.i dont want to exist for the rest of my life crying alone on my birthday, <e2>getting slowly more depressed every year</e2>. i need a suicide booth for a comfortable death tbh."

"<e1>im really lonely lately</e1>. ive been trying to date but <e2>the only girls that ask me out are poly, and i cant do that</e2>. (please dont try to convince me to, it makes me wanna die) all the monogamous girls i meet wanna stay friends. <e3>i feel isolated</e3> and like im not good enough for anyone."

"<e1>everyone is so selfish</e1> and it irks me <e2>im so disgusted by them</e2>. <e3>so brutal so angry and unreasonable creatures, its so depressing to see</e3> and <e4>i feel like i dont want to be here</e4> ,in such a nasty place anymore"

"im losing the battle, but i used to write songs and poetry to cope. reddit amateur here, if i break rules dont be afraid to tell me. this is just for anyone in a similar situation, any critique/thoughts on the poem would help. thankssad truthsdead flowers left with nothing but weeds like how your wants banish your needs life lived by the rules a tortured soul born to lose how many hints to take? how many clues? mind games play you sun shines when your down then sets when your up after the fall its hard to move on when you cant move at all maybes just the echo of never meant to be"

"i don't know if this question belongs here, but i can't talk to my therapist anytime soon and this is really on my mind... the last days, i found pictures of my friends, my family and me in various places over the last years. in quite a lot of cases, i didn't even remember being there with them or doing certain things. before seeing these things, i could have sworn i didn't do certain things. my memory used to be basically photografic until i developed a severe depression last summer, i stopped taking antidepressants three weeks ago and i am ""back to life""...could maybe anyone relate somehow to this?"

"and this cycle has been in continuation since 2019. <e1>i always get berated by my parents</e1> for <e2>using mobile phone</e2>,but how could i tell them <e3>this is the only thing that is stopping me from getting mad and having a mental breakdown</e3>. when i put my phone <e4>a sheer feeling of loneliness strike me</e4>, like damn i don't have any friends and absolutely nobody with whom i can talk, my lack of social skills will really make me die a virgin, cause im not handsome or tall enough to be approached by any girl. <e5>i really hate my life</e5>. i really hope i contrast a disease which first numb the pain receptors ( cause im very timid) and then kills me in my sleep. i always fantasize of dying in my sleep and never make up again"

"just venting...today <e1>i broke down really bad</e1>. my boyfriend was feeling down so to calm him down i told him that i love him a lotthen he asked ""why"". i thought about it a lot but really just... had no special reasons...he knows about my depression and he just said ""no reasons huh... maybe it's because you feel love starved that you come up to me. maybe you're lying about you feelings to have my attention, you always act so emotionless and empty.""i knew he was mad and didn't mean it but now <e2>i feel betrayed, sad and empty</e2>. he apologized and begged for mercy and i said it's ok and he only felt down that's why he said it.... i don't know what to do oh i'm such a drama queen."

so i have found out my best friend is cutting herself. she already told me she has many problems but still didnt tell me what they exactly are. im trying my best to show her that i am with her if she needs me but one time i wasnt home she wrote me a long message i didnt read cuz i wasnt home and she deleted it quickly after. she doesnt eat enough neither is she sleeping for more than 4 hours. today she told me she stayed in the bathtub for half the night and <e1>she wanted to faint and possibly drown</e1>. all i know is that <e2>their parents (they are divorced) really shout at her she is useless</e2> and just angry with everyone all the  time. <e3>i am getting more worried every day</e3>. if anyone knows what more i can do please tell me cuz im running out of ideas.
feeling low since weeks now. ah everything feels unreal. i feel like i don't know who i am.

i've came to a point whereby <e1>i feel that i don't have a will to survive</e1>. i just have this feeling deep inside of me that <e2>everything in the world is weighing me down and i just can't seem to put myself back up</e2>. i feel like at this point <e3>i have fucked up too many things in my life</e3> and <e4>i just don't know how people live happily and go about every single thing in life</e4>. deep down i want to get better at everything but i just don't know how. anyone else feels me?

"i've relapsed. i'm sh-ing again, drinking, not left my bed since monday... the usual hopeless, worthless, suicidal etc. i know i should get help. i'm just terrified of making the phone call to get an appointment. maybe i'm faking it. maybe i'll be fine tomorrow. what should i do?"

"i keep playing this imaginary scenario in my head. i'm at work tending to a cheerful customer, and it goes like:customer: how are you today?  :)me: heh...want the truth, or the socially acceptable answer?customer: ...the truth. :\me: ...are you sure? okay, i'm nearing the end of my rope, and my hands are burning with the desire to let go. i just want to make my anxiety and depression go away, but they won't. haha, i can't even afford to seek help. of course, you don't really want to know these things, so here's the socially acceptable answer anyway: i'm doing great :d and yourself?customer: wow...uhh...it gets better?  :|me: don't worry about it. your total is 10.75.i don't know...<e1>i'm getting tired to faking my answers to these stupid courtesy questions</e1>. <e2>no one cares how i'm doing</e2>. <e3>the small talk isn't good for anyone</e3>, and i didn't include it in my social script. most of the time it catches me off guard. i just want them to stuff their faces and get on with their own miserable existences."

<e1>i didnt have the best childhood but it wasnt terrible either</e1>. <e2>it left me intense abandonment issues and anxious avoidant attachment style</e2>. <e3>i dont really trust or feel close to anyone in my life</e3> and its causing me to disassociate a lot. i live with my boyfriend right now but if we broke up id have to move back in with my abusive mother. neither of these options are great for me right now.<e4>i just want to be alone</e4> <e5>im tired of the pain im in caused by the relationships i have with other people</e5>.

"i feel like when everything is okay it's great but lately i'm back to one issue after another. it seems like when my relationship is okay the rest of my life is fine. i want to go to therapy but i'm very tired of people saying ""you don't need it"" or my parents asking if it's because of them. today, after <e1>a short message</e1>, followed by <e2>a fight from my significant other of 6 years</e2>, <e3>i'm afraid i'm on a decline again</e3>."

next year i'm supposed to be going to university but it's extremely expensive + my family is in a tough spot financially and i really don't want to be a burden to them. also because of that reason i can't go to therapy because we can't afford it.<e1>my parents are always fighting</e1> and <e2>it stresses me out so fucking much</e2> because not only do <e3>i have to help two grown adults make up</e3> (or at least stop screaming at each other) but <e4>i also have to comfort my younger siblings</e4>.and to top it all off since this is my final year of highschool <e5>i'll have to take my final test in about a month</e5> but <e6>i'm getting so overwhelmed</e6> that <e7>i'm skipping school weeks at a time</e7>.i can't take it anymore i just want to rest.

"<e1>i've been trying to put myself back out there since restrictions have been lifted some. but still nothing</e1>. last saturday night my kids were at my ex mother in law's house and i ventured to a local bar. the only guys that hit on me were really not my type at all. the only one that is give the time of day to, were after skinny younger girls. i tried talking to one but i could tell he wasn't interested after i explained about my sexuality. fml. so i finished my malibu and pineapple and went home. i put on my comfy pajamas and binged watched season 3 of outlander for the 50th time. i downloaded a dating app...no luck there. <e2>i'm beginning to feel depressed and lost again</e2>. are you out there? because i'm here waiting..."
"does any one else start feeling depressed all the sudden and start sobbing, all alone, then you see yourself in the mirror and just think youre doing it for attention?"

"<e1>im a fucking loser</e1>. <e2>no legit job, no great education, horrible grades due to depression, no friends, got dumped</e2>. <e3>everyone has left me or screwed me</e3> over the past month and <e4>ive only been feeling worse and worse</e4>. <e5>im so lonely</e5> and i have no one to vent to about everything thats happened because <e6>my support system is gone</e6>. <e7>i have nothing going for me</e7> and i deserve everything bad thats come to me too so i cant be that upset, but im at a loss of what to do. <e8>i feel very very hopeless and alone</e8> and lay in bed all day but dont sleep at night until i sob myself to sleep. <e9>i fucking hate my life</e9> but it just seems like it gets worse so i should get used to it."

"i admit: <e1>i havent been well nor have i been truly happy</e1>. though i mightve experienced those feelings at some point, they were never long-lasting or they seemed too superficial. instead, <e2>im always overwhelmed by the feelings i hate</e2>. i dont really know how to describe the effects. <e3>they make me feel like im rotting from inside out</e3>. these feelings. <e4>the feeling of failure</e4> when <e5>i see someone achieve more than me at my age</e5>. <e6>the feeling of disappointment</e6> when <e7>i cant find my passion while someone is able to find theirs</e7>. <e8>the feeling of envy</e8> when <e9>a person has better luck than me in a card game</e9> because then i feel that their life, in general, is luckier than mine. i curse myself for feeling these ways, knowing that im accountable for my emotions. but how can i fix this? my ideals will never change so i should change my environment. though the problem is, everywhere i go is always reminding me that im a failure and that im no one special."

"im a 15 year old boy that has been depressed for about 3 months now and <e1>im just sick of it</e1>, im exhausted 24/7 and <e2>all i want to do is either sleep or lay in bed all day and stare at the wall with my thoughts</e2>. <e3>havent been to school since january</e3> because i do online school and im just hoping that when i return to school in august, it will all get better. <e4>i feel completely lonely</e4> and havent told anybody that i feel trapped in constant sadness. i guess what im asking is, am i able to get better without having to tell my parent or my brother that im depressed and getting depression meds? <e5>im worried</e5> that <e6>im always going to feel this way</e6>."

sometimes i feel like <e1>i am taking having depression</e1> to <e2>get away from college work and responsibilities</e2>. i do have everything needed for a "good life" and my parents tell me that i have nothing to be sad about. i wonder if this is just my imagination to get away from it all.

"to be depressed and have the option to be distracted by money, relationships, sex is not as the same as being depressed because of pure emptiness, a life where you don't have the luxury to distract yourself by life experiences. like you are monk but living in the city, not in the mountains. it's awful."

"i dont have any serious trauma, and <e1>i feel like i'm sad/depressed for no reason</e1> making me <e2>feel guilty</e2> about it all the time...to summarize i have great parents, and they're really my only friends at this moment.i have felt the inability to make any friends. my parents are the two greatest people alive, and with that they want a successful future. i work (a job) around ten hours out of school (grade 9) and am doing courses around 2-3 years over my grade... i feel a little stressed with the homework, but when <e3>i see  people haveing  actual genuine trauma</e3> and <e4>i feel pathetic for being so sad</e4> when i have a good family and decent life."

<e1>im tired</e1>. <e2>im tired of questioning things every day</e2>. <e3>im tired of white lies</e3>. <e4>im tired of outright lies</e4>. <e5>im tired of lying to myself</e5>. <e6>im tired of feeling jealous</e6>. <e7>im tired of empty promises</e7>. <e8>im tired of not putting myself first</e8>. <e9>im tired of worrying if im good enough</e9>. <e10>im tired of feeling like the second choice</e10>. <e11>im tired of hiding how i feel</e11>. <e12>im tired of not feeling validated</e12>. <e13>im tired of not feeling loved</e13>. <e14>im tired of politics</e14>. <e15>im tired of all the hate</e15>. <e16>im tired of feeling ashamed</e16>. <e17>im tired of being alone</e17>. <e18>im tired of feeling like im not supported</e18>. <e19>im tired of feeling like im taken for granted</e19>. <e20>im tired of always looking over my shoulder</e20>.

my grades are beyond saving because <e1>my brain has shut down</e1> and i can't do complex tasks anymore without blanking out. <e2>i have no passions</e2> so i have no hobbies or skills that are actually useful and would help me in making a living. i see no future ahead of me. i genuinely believe that i'll die in my 20's. i don't see a way out of depression and i have accepted that i will forever be like this.

never thought id be on something like this but man i wish i had someone i could really talk to about my feelings. feels like no matter what happens every one is against me. nothing ever goes right anymore i dont know how much longer i can take it. i can always appear happy but can never truly feel it... idek where im going with this. sorry if you read all this just needed to rant. didnt mean to waste ur time.

can somebody tell me why when i have a good day i'm more depressed at night? like i have a amazing job that i love i have a nice car i have pets i have an amazing man in my life who treats me well i have anything i could ever want yet i still just want to die i don't understand it i have amazing days and i'm fine but the second i get home from work i instantly am so depressed i can't stop jt at least at work or during the day if i get depressed i can push it aside. i'm so sick of telling everybody i'm fine of everything's okay when deep deep down there's days it's not fine.. is there anybody in the same boat as me no matter what they seem to do they just wanna die

"<e1>ive been honest about my suicidal thoughts with a few close friends over the last decade</e1>. not to scare them, or threaten that i was gonna do it, but to <e2>share how painful my depression can get</e2>. and also because <e3>im too scared to be honest with any therapist ive ever had</e3>, because <e4>the one time i was she almost sent me to a hospital</e4>.sometimes i wish i was close to someone that has these thoughts, too. so i dont feel like a crazy person explaining it. and so they sincerely empathize instead of shrug it off like its dramatic or be polite and kind but in an empty way where i know they really dont understand.<e5>i feel like i must know other people that have these thoughts, but i guess im just not close enough to anyone that does for them to tell me about it</e5>.do you have anyone like that? <e6>i feel like its weird</e6> that i dont. is this more uncommon than it seems like?"
